features.name: Product Effectiveness
features.description: How well the product works to achieve its intended purpose
evidence_sentences: Excellent products at an affordable price!
Good product but it didn't have the same fragrance I remembered from a previous purchase and that was disappointing.
Fantastic for travel as well as home use.

features.name: Brand Reputation
features.description: The customer's perception of the brand's quality and reliability
evidence_sentences: I like all the products in this kit but quality control is horrible.
Overall I've never been disappointed by Jack Black products, and believe you won't get better men's luxury toiletries for the price.
Fantastic for travel as well as home use.

summary.text: Jack Black Shave Essentials Set is a great go-to kit for men. The face wash and the shave cream leave his face very smooth. I've never been disappointed by Jack Black products. Order this to spoil yourself or as a gift.

claims.text: The face wash and the shave cream leave his face very smooth
I've never been disappointed by Jack Black products
